name: @alonetone/stitches
description: Stitching Together MP3 Playback in HTML5 Audio with ES6

scripts.test: npm start && nightwatch -c nightwatch-local.conf.json; npm stop
scripts.browserstack: npm start && node browserstack.runner.js -c nightwatch-browserstack.conf.js -e safari12,safari13,chrome,chromeMac,firefox,firefoxMac,edge,iphoneXS,ios13,ios14,pixel,galaxys9,ucbrowser; npm stop
scripts.localBS: npm start && node browserstack.runner.js -c nightwatch-browserstack.conf.js -e safari13

author: Sudara
